body.p: The IFRS for SMEsÂ® Standard includes a section on the concepts and basic principles underlying the financial statements of small and medium-sized entities. That section is based on the 1989 Framework. The Board will consider whether it should amend this section of the IFRS for SMEs Standard when it next reviews that Standard.
